name: Tearlaments Reinoheart
effectText: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Tearlaments" monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Tearlaments Reinoheart". If this card is sent to the GY by card effect: You can Special Summon this card (but banish it when it leaves the field), and if you do, send 1 "Tearlaments" card from your hand to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Tearlaments Reinoheart" once per turn.
